name: pdfimages
description: Pdfimages saves images from a Portable Document Format (PDF) file as Portable Pixmap (PPM), Portable Bitmap (PBM), or JPEG files.

Options.val: Specifies the first page to scan.
Specifies the last page to scan.
Normally, all images are written as PBM or  PPM files.With this option,images in DCT format are  saved as JPEG files.All non-DCT images are saved in PBM/PPM format as usual.
Specify the user password for the PDF file.
Donâ€™t print any messages or errors.
Print usage information.  (-help and --help are equivalent.)
